ques: Please make sure to wear the _________ attire for the formal event.
After being sick for a week, he felt very _________ and couldn't get out of bed.
She's a _________ inventor, always coming up with new gadgets.
Using smartphones has become _________ among people of all ages.
The car came to an _________ stop when the driver slammed on the brakes.
She tied the knot on her shoelaces so _________ that they wouldn't come undone.
Her talent for painting is truly _________; her work is unlike anything I've seen before.
The new shoes felt _________ and uncomfortable at first, but they'll break in over time.
The foundation of the building is built on a _________ rock base.
The movie we watched last night was truly _________; the acting was terrible.
The baby's skin felt incredibly _________ to the touch.
I have a _________ exercise routine that I follow every morning.
The silence in the library was so complete that you could hear a pin drop; it was _________ silence.
She loves to travel and try _________ foods from different cultures.
The view from the mountaintop was absolutely _________, with breathtaking scenery in every direction.
The _________ cold is often caused by a virus.
The _________ plants in the botanical garden fascinated visitors.
The store offers _________ discounts for loyal customers.
He expressed his _________ disbelief when he heard the news.
The deadline for the project is approaching, so we have to work _________ schedules.
After sitting at the desk for hours, her neck and shoulders felt _________.
The _________ use of humor in the presentation kept the audience engaged.
I had an _________ day at work, with one problem after another.
Their friendship is based on a _________ trust that has lasted for years.
The transition from one song to another in the concert was so _________ that you could hardly notice it.
Her _________ departure left everyone in shock and confusion.
Her argument was _________ and lacked supporting evidence.
It's important to use _________ grammar and punctuation when writing a professional email.
The resort offered _________ spa treatments using local herbs.
The athlete showed a _________ performance in the championship game.
His journey from poverty to success is an _________ story of determination and hard work.
It's _________ to see people walking their dogs in the park.
The old book's pages had become _________ and yellowed with age.
Their _________ meetings help keep everyone on the same page.
The food at that restaurant was so _________ that we couldn't eat it.
The comedian's jokes were met with _________ laughter from the audience.
The bridge's _________ structure couldn't withstand the heavy rain and collapsed.
The negotiation process went surprisingly _________, and we reached an agreement quickly.
The chef followed the _________ recipe to create a delicious meal.
It was a _________ solution to a complex problem.
The teacher's _________ tone startled the students in the classroom.
The lid of the jar was screwed on so _________ that I couldn't open it.
The coffee shop knows my _________ order by heart.
His collection of _________ cars was the envy of many.
The hurricane left _________ devastation in its wake.
His _________ performance in the competition was unexpected, as he had trained hard.
The _________ change in weather caught us off guard.
The car's engine runs so _________ that you can barely hear it.
The competition in the market is so _________ that only the most innovative companies survive.
The chocolate bar melted in my hand because it wasn't kept in a _________ state.
Miscommunication is a _________ problem in many relationships.
The news of the accident was absolutely _________; I hope everyone is okay.
The performance of the young gymnast was nothing short of _________; she defied gravity with her moves.
He's known for his _________ wit and wordplay.
The dress fit her so _________ that she could hardly breathe.
Learning how to set a _________ table is an important part of etiquette.
The company's financial situation is quite _________, with steady growth over the years.
The _________ Wi-Fi signal in the remote area made it difficult to connect to the internet.
The _________ detective quickly solved the mystery.
The tropical island was known for its _________ wildlife and lush landscapes.
After applying the lotion, her dry hands felt much _________.
_________ sense dictates that you should look both ways before crossing the street.
His demeanor was _________ and formal during the business meeting.
The bus runs on a _________ schedule, arriving at the same time every day.
The scientist made an _________ discovery that could revolutionize the field of medicine.
Safety precautions must be taken to ensure the _________ handling of hazardous materials.
The team's defense played a _________ game, not allowing any goals.
Her headache was so _________ that she had to lie down.
His _________ decision to resign surprised his colleagues.
The movie's ending was an _________ surprise; no one saw it coming.
